text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here!
Yes its me Bob...
Join me for learning street with Bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Fiery, funny and fun-tastically fabulous
That’s our performer for this evening. Ms. F”

We’re gonna have some fun
Some f-f-f-f-fun

It’s going to be so much fun
So much f-f-f-f-fun

That’s the sound I make
And that is all it takes

You know what rhymes with tyre
It’s the word ‘fire’
F-F… fire F-F… fire

I can swim in water
Fish live in water
F-F… fish F-F…fishes

I love to play a game
Football is its name
f…f football  f…f football

A fan goes round and round
Making not much sound
F-F… fan  F-F… fan

A fox is cunning, is what they say
But all he wants to do is play
F-F… fox F-F… fox

I love to play the fiddle
Diddle diddle diddly fiddle
F..f fiddle  F…f fiddle

A bird cannot fly
With no feathers in the sky
F…f.. feathers  F…f......feathers

Along with a spoon it goes
It’s a fork, we’re sure you know
F-F… fork  F-F… fork

What’s good for every mood,
A table full of fabulous food
F-F… food F-F… food

She spreads her magic with her wings
The fairy loves to dance as she sings
F-F… fairy  F-F… fairy

We surely had lots of fun
Lots of f-f-f-f-fun

It‘s been so much fun
So much f-f-f-f-fun

That’s the sound F makes
And that is all it takes
Judges, can we have the scores!
Fantastic!
Fabulous!
Fun!
Funny!
Fascinating!
Thank you Ms. F and you fantastic Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then farewell !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
